A4.text: By then, 16,594 official death sentences had been dispensed throughout France since June 1793, of which 2,639 were in Paris alone.

A5.text: The Terror concluded with the fall of Robespierre and his alleged allies in July 1794, in what is known as the Thermidorian Reaction.
